text:
The mercenary company known as the Manifest Legion, licensed by House [[Deneith]], is notable for being composed almost entirely of wielders of [[arcane magic]]. [[Wandslinger|wandslinger]]s and [[wizard]]s with a focus on [[conjuration]] magic make up the bulk of the company's membership. It is known for summoning [[elemental]]s and even [[fiend]]s during pitched battles to cause chaos among enemy ranks and disrupt cavalry charges. 

The Manifest Legion tends to operate in small units, known as cabals, on the battlefield. "Earthbound" units typically include several summoners protected by non-magical bodyguards, while aerial units consist solely of spellcasters, soaring above the battlefield with the [[fly]] spell and raining down missiles of arcane force.

The Legion is led by a [[Brelish|Breland]] [[gnome]] [[wizard]] named Long Uthar.
title: Manifest Legion
